text: Jiaru tamen tong ni [mu sheng] zhenglun, ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Wo yi chedi guishun an la, zhuisui wo de ren ye yiyang [guishun an la].” Ni dui shou ci jingdian zhe [you jing ren] he wenmang shuo:“Nimen ye guishun [an la] ma?” Jiaru tamen guishun, tamen que yi huode zhengdao. Jiaru tamen beili, name, ni de zeren zhishi chuanda [zhu][wo de qishi]. An la dui puren shi quan shi de.
